infoMessage: Add Featured Items to showcase key content in your collection. These items will appear as cards in a carousel, each including a rich text content with an optional image.
previewCarouselHeader: Live preview of your custom featured items

deleteAll.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all featured items from this collection?
deleteAll.success: All featured items have been deleted successfully.

backToTypeSelectionButton.label: Back to featured item type selection
backToTypeSelectionButton.dialogText: If you go back, your changes will be discarded.

dialog.title: Delete Featured Item
dialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete this featured item?

deleteSingleFeaturedItem.success: Featured item has been deleted successfully.
deleteSingleFeaturedItem.defaultError: An error occurred while deleting the featured item. Please try again later.

removeConfirmation: If you continue, your changes will be discarded.

baseItem.label: Select a type of featured item
baseItem.required: Please select a type of featured item or remove the item.

custom.label: Custom
custom.description: This type of featured item allows you to create blog posts, news, or any other type of content you want to feature in the collection. It can include rich content and an optional image as a banner.

dvObject.label: Dataverse Object
dvObject.description: This type of featured item allows you to feature a <bold>Collection</bold>, <bold>Dataset</bold>, or <bold>File</bold>.

image.label: Image
image.description: Upload an image that will be used as the blog banner and thumbnail. Supported formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP. Max file size: {{maxImageSize}}.

invalid.size: The file is too large. The maximum file size is {{maxImageSize}}

image.helperText: For best results, use a landscape image (16:9, 4:3, or 5:3). Check the preview at the top of the page to see how it will look.
image.aspectRatioWarning:
Your image has approximately a {{aspectRatio}} aspect ratio and may not display well in the landscape banner.
For best results, use a landscape image (16:9, 4:3, or 5:3). You can still use it, but check the preview at the top of the page to see how it will look.

invalid.maxLength: Content must be {{maxLength}} characters or less.

dvObjectUrl.label: Dataverse Object URL
dvObjectUrl.helperText: Paste the Collection, Dataset or File URL you want to feature. You can also paste a Dataset DOI URL directly.
dvObjectUrl.invalid: The URL must have the correct format for a Dataverse Collection, Dataset, File, or Dataset DOI URL.

submitStatus.success: Featured items have been updated successfully.

form.maxItemsReached: You can add up to {{maxFeaturedItems}} featured items.
